purpose: To facilitate the design and execution of agentic workflows by leveraging Dapr and large language models.
principle: Builds on Dapr for distributed application runtime and integrates with large language models for intelligent workflow automation.
reusability: Offers modular components that can be easily integrated into existing systems using Dapr's APIs and configurations.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and stability for production use.
name: floki
highlight: Simplifies the creation and management of agentic workflows using Dapr and LLMs.
